title: STracker
description: This is an iOS application that allows to manage your different exercise sessions, saving the session duration, distance, description, title and others.

title: KeeperApp
description: This is an application that provides to typical to-do list functionality. This application utilizes ReactJS, NodeJS with ExpressJS and a MongoDB to user the to-do's of the users. It runs in two separate docker containers, one for the database, and the other one for the React/Node application.

title: DatingApp
description: A web application developed using Angular for the front-end and DotNet for the backend. Used also dotnet EntityFramwork.

title: Contact Manager
description: Spring boot application with Java server faces that provides a user interfaces with CRUD operations. Allows to create, delete, update and read contacts from PostgreSQL database using Hibernate as ORM. Also stores users uploaded images in Cloudify service
